title: Generalized Yamabe Flows
authors: J{\o}rgen Olsen Lye, Boris Vertman, Mannaim Gennaro Vitti
abstract:
In this work we introduce a family of conformal flows generalizing the
classical Yamabe flow. We prove that for a large class of such flows long-time
existence holds, and the arguments are in fact simpler than in the classical
case. Moreover, we establish convergence for the case of negative scalar
curvature and expect a similar statement for the positive and the flat cases as
well.
